mapper.insert: insert into social_practice (practice_name, practice_type, organizer, start_date, end_date, description) values (#{practiceName}, #{practiceType}, #{organizer}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{description})

insert into student_practice (student_id, practice_id, role, duration, performance_score, evaluation, certificate_url, status) values (#{studentId}, #{practiceId}, #{role}, #{duration}, #{performanceScore}, #{evaluation}, #{certificateUrl}, #{status})
mapper.select: select sp.record_id, sp.student_id, sp.practice_id, sp.role, sp.duration, sp.performance_score, sp.evaluation, sp.certificate_url, sp.status, sp.created_time, sp.updated_time, p.practice_name, p.practice_type, p.organizer, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.description, s.student_no, s.name as student_name from student_practice sp left join social_practice p on sp.practice_id = p.practice_id left join student s on sp.student_id = s.student_id where sp.record_id = #{recordId}
